const useSaveCommands=()=>{return newCommand=>{// @ts-ignore
chrome.storage.sync.get(['commands']).then(result=>{const existingCommands=result.commands||[];// Combine existing commands with the new command
const updatedCommands=[...existingCommands,newCommand];// @ts-ignore
chrome.storage.sync.set({commands:updatedCommands}).then(()=>{console.log('Commands saved successfully!');}).catch(err=>{console.error('Error saving commands:',err);});}).catch(err=>{console.error('Error fetching commands:',err);});};};export default useSaveCommands;
